channel.title: My Portfolio Design
channel.description:
What do you think of my portfolio? also what do you think should be changed. I was going for a flat design theme.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=659599.0;attach=22872;image[/img]

item.title: My Portfolio Design
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:12, topic:540735”]I’ve certainly seen worse code, that’s for sure. You’re getting the hang of it as you said but it’s the more basic things that you’ve skipped, naming conventions, tabbing conventions etcetera. There’s still a lot to look into but aesthetically the design looks great, the code however needs a little work. Read up on class and id selectors, alongside their naming. Don’t capitalise the first letter, keep it all lowercase so .Services_Web becomes .services_web, and ensure you tab at the correct point rather than just a whole block of code here and a whole block of code there.

I tend to try and avoid using padding-top: padding-left: margin-right: and resort to the shorthand padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; and margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;. It’s good to see you using em’s for font size as well, a good amount of people I know avoid using them for no particular reason so good job.

Keep up the improvements![/quote]This is a good summary also try to actually use the new HTML5 tags. em is very useful as it scales with parent font (iirc), thus great for dynamic layouts/varying font-types.

Read full topic

item.title: My Portfolio Design
item.dc:creator: @Frantix Frantix
item.description:
@Frantix wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:12, topic:540735”]I’ve certainly seen worse code, that’s for sure. You’re getting the hang of it as you said but it’s the more basic things that you’ve skipped, naming conventions, tabbing conventions etcetera. There’s still a lot to look into but aesthetically the design looks great, the code however needs a little work. Read up on class and id selectors, alongside their naming. Don’t capitalise the first letter, keep it all lowercase so .Services_Web becomes .services_web, and ensure you tab at the correct point rather than just a whole block of code here and a whole block of code there.

I tend to try and avoid using padding-top: padding-left: margin-right: and resort to the shorthand padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; and margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;. It’s good to see you using em’s for font size as well, a good amount of people I know avoid using them for no particular reason so good job.

Keep up the improvements![/quote]

Thanks man, I will take a look at everything that you said. I was just getting down basic html and css so I can move onto php.

Read full topic

item.title: My Portfolio Design
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve certainly seen worse code, that’s for sure. You’re getting the hang of it as you said but it’s the more basic things that you’ve skipped, naming conventions, tabbing conventions etcetera. There’s still a lot to look into but aesthetically the design looks great, the code however needs a little work. Read up on class and id selectors, alongside their naming. Don’t capitalise the first letter, keep it all lowercase so .Services_Web becomes .services_web, and ensure you tab at the correct point rather than just a whole block of code here and a whole block of code there.

I tend to try and avoid using padding-top: padding-left: margin-right: and resort to the shorthand padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; and margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;. It’s good to see you using em’s for font size as well, a good amount of people I know avoid using them for no particular reason so good job.

Keep up the improvements!

Read full topic

item.title: My Portfolio Design
item.dc:creator: @Frantix Frantix
item.description:
@Frantix wrote:

I am still not the greatest but i’m getting the hang of it :P, it’s a bit sloppy but if you have any things that I could improve on please say <3

[code=html5]

Braedens Portfolio 
<script type="text/javascript">

$(document).ready(function() {
$(’#buttons’).localScroll({duration:800});
});


Hi! I'm Braeden Dillon, a young web designer and developer who loves pushing pixels.


I love to develop clean simple and effective solutions. That's what I am most passionate about. I'd love for you to check out some of my work.

Avaliable for projects

LATEST PROJECT

<h2>This is my latest project that I have finished for some rand.</h2>

<img src="icons/latest.png">
View Portfolio

Services


Website Design

Let me help your company with a entirely new style.


Logo Design

Need a new way to express your company you've found it.

My Portfolio

Other

This includes all sorts of fun and fantasical things.

"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication" - Leonardo da Vinci

My Portfolio

My passion and love is to design simple, clean and responsive solutions.

Burnside High School

Web Design

Teens Social Network

Web Design

Braeden's Portfolio

Web Design

Random Logo Design

Logo Design

Random Logo Design

Logo Design

Random Logo Design

Logo Design

GET IN TOUCH

Why not break the ice? I'd love to hear from you. Any questions or queries.

Send Message
[/code]

[code=css]@import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:200);

  • {
    margin: 0;
    }
    body {
    font-family: ‘Raleway’, sans-serif;
    color: #fff;
    }

.header {
width: 100%;
background: #4b6b87;
min-height: 70px;
position: fixed;
z-index: 9999;
}

.icon {
height: 70px;
font-size: 18px;
line-height: 20px;
}

.Top {
position: fixed;
bottom: 0;
right: 0;
width: 50px;
height: 50px;
display: block;
background: #00a27e url(up-arrow.png) no-repeat center center;
-webkit-transition: 1s;
-moz-transition: 1s;
transition: 1s;
}

i:hover {
color: #00a27e;
}

#buttons {
float: right;
top: 20px;
right: 15px;
position: relative;
}

#buttons a {
color: #fff;
text-decoration: none;
}

i {
margin-right: 20px;
}

.Profile {
background-color: #4b6b87;
width: 100%;
height: 750px;
}

.profile_info {
text-align: center;
top: 20%;
position: relative;
margin-left: 100px;
margin-right: 100px;
}

.profile_info img {
width: 142px;
height: 200px;
border-radius: 15px;
bottom: 30px;
position: relative;
}

.profile_info b {
color: #00a27e;
}

.project_button {
top: 50px;
position: relative;
}

.project_button a {
text-decoration: none;
color: #fff;
padding-top: 18px;
padding-bottom: 18px;
padding-left: 80px;
padding-right: 80px;
font-size: 1.214em;
border: 3px solid #fff;
margin-top: 20px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
transition: all 0.25s;
-webkit-transition: all 0.25s;
}

.project_button a:hover {
background-color: #fff;
color: black;
}

.Latest {
background-color: #ffffff;
width: 100%;
height: 800px;
color: black;
text-align: center;
position: relative;
margin-top: 5%;
}

.Latest h1, h2 {
text-align: center;
}

.Latest h1 {
font-size: 5em;
color: #4b6b87;
text-transform: uppercase;
bottom: 30px;
position: relative;
}

.Latest h2 {
font-size: 1.78em;
color: #7e7e7e;
}

.latest_button {
position: relative;
margin-top: 50px;
}

.latest_button a {
text-decoration: none;
color: black;
padding-top: 18px;
padding-bottom: 18px;
padding-left: 60px;
padding-right: 60px;
font-size: 1.214em;
border: 3px solid #4b6b87;
transition: all 0.25s;
-webkit-transition: all 0.25s;
}

.latest_button a:hover {
color: white;
background-color: #4b6b87;
}

.Services {
background-color: #4b6b87;
width: 100%;
height: 850px;
text-align: center;
}

.Services h1 {
font-size: 5em;
padding-top: 60px;
padding-bottom: 50px;
}

.Services h3 {
font-size: 2.1428em;
font-weight: 700;
padding-top: 30px;
}

.Services p {
padding-top: 15px;
font-size: 1.4285em;
text-align: center;
line-height: 1.35em;
max-width: 300px;
}

.Services_Box {
text-align: center;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
position: relative;
width: 1100px;
}

.Services_Web, .Services_Logo {
float: left;
margin-right: 100px;
}

.Services_Other {
float: left;
}

.Services_button {
position: relative;
top: 100px;
}

.Services_button a {
text-decoration: none;
color: #fff;
padding-top: 18px;
padding-bottom: 18px;
padding-left: 80px;
padding-right: 80px;
font-size: 1.214em;
border: 3px solid #fff;
margin-top: 20px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
transition: all 0.25s;
-webkit-transition: all 0.25s;
}

.Services_button a:hover {
color: black;
background-color: #fff;
}

.Me {
background-color: #00a27e;
width: 100%;
height: 400px;
max-height: 400px;
text-align: center;
}

.Me h1 {
font-size: 2.7em;
margin-bottom: 20px;
color: #fff;
text-align: left;
line-height: 1.1;
max-width: 725px;
padding-left: 50px;
padding-top: 150px;
}

.Me img {
float: right;
position: relative;
padding-right: 50px;
padding-top: 50px;
height: 293px;
width: 353px;
}

.Portfolio {
background-color: #ffffff;
width: 100%;
height: 1100px;
}

.Portfolio img {
opacity: 0.6;
}

.Portfolio img:hover {
opacity: 1.0;
cursor: pointer;
}

.img_container {
width: 300px;
text-align: center;
display: block;
float: right;
color: black;
margin-right: 50px;
}

.Portfolio_container {
max-width: 1100px;
display: block;
position: relative;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
}

.Portfolio h1 {
font-size: 5em;
color: #4b6b87;
text-transform: uppercase;
text-align: center;
padding-top: 60px;
padding-bottom: 50px;
}

.Portfolio h2 {
font-size: 1.78em;
text-align: center;
max-width: 600px;
color: #7e7e7e;
margin: 0 auto;
padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.Portfolio h3 {
color: #555555;
}

.Portfolio h4 {
color: #00a27e;
}

.Portfolio_button {
top: 50px;
position: relative;
text-align: center;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
}

.Portfolio_button a {
text-decoration: none;
color: black;
padding-top: 18px;
padding-bottom: 18px;
padding-left: 60px;
padding-right: 60px;
font-size: 1.214em;
border: 3px solid #4b6b87;
transition: all 0.25s;
-webkit-transition: all 0.25s;
}

.Portfolio_button a:hover {
color: white;
background-color: #4b6b87;
}

.Contact {
background-color: #4b6b87;
width: 100%;
height: 800px;
text-align: center
}

.Contact_container {
max-width: 900px;
text-align: center;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
}

.Contact h1 {
font-size: 5em;
color: #fff;
text-transform: uppercase;
text-align: center;
padding-top: 60px;
padding-bottom: 50px;
}

.Contact h2 {
font-size: 2.1428em;
padding-top: 20px;
padding-bottom: 60px;
}

.Contact b {
color: #00a27e;
}

.input_container {
max-width: 1200px;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
text-align: center;
}

.Contact .fullname {
width: 500px;
height: 60px;
background: transparent;
-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
transition: all 0.5s;
box-shadow: none;
border-radius: 0px;
border: 3px solid #fff;
font-size: 1.2em;
color: #dfdfdf;
padding-left: 15px;
margin-right: 15px;
}

.Contact .email {
width: 600px;
height: 60px;
background: transparent;
-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
transition: all 0.5s;
box-shadow: none;
border-radius: 0px;
border: 3px solid #fff;
font-size: 1.2em;
color: #dfdfdf;
padding-left: 15px;
}

.Contact .message {
width: 1145px;
height: 180px;
background: transparent;
-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
-moz-transition: all 0.5s;
transition: all 0.5s;
box-shadow: none;
border-radius: 0px;
border: 3px solid #fff;
font-size: 1.2em;
color: #dfdfdf;
padding-left: 15px;
margin-top: 15px;
}

.Contact .message:active {
background-color: red;
}[/code]

Read full topic
